description.p: Image Background Remover is a desktop application for quickly and accurately removing backgrounds from images. It provides a one-click workflow for single images and a batch mode for processing multiple photos. The application is designed for photographers, designers, and anyone who needs transparent PNGs or isolated subjects.

ul.li: Automatic subject detection with AI-powered matting for clean edges
Supports common image formats: PNG, JPEG, WEBP
Preserves alpha channel and offers optional feathering and edge smoothing
Command-line mode for automation and integration into scripts

description.p: The tool is optimized for accuracy and speed on modern desktops and can be used entirely offline once installed.
